result.eng: Is this the road between Belfast and Derry?
result.ga: An é seo an bóthar idir Béal Feirste agus Doire
result.orig: An é seo an bóthar idir Béal Feirste agus Doire
result.html: An é seo an bóthar idir Béal Feirste agus DoireIs this the road between Belfast and Derry?
result.ponchtml: An é seo an bóṫar idir Béal Feirste agus DoireIs this the road between Belfast and Derry?

result.eng: The road connects Belfast and Derry.
result.ga: Ceanglaíonn an bóthar Béal Feirste agus Doire
result.orig: Ceanglaíonn an bóthar Béal Feirste agus Doire
result.html: Ceanglaíonn an bóthar Béal Feirste agus DoireThe road connects Belfast and Derry.
result.ponchtml: Ceanglaíonn an bóṫar Béal Feirste agus DoireThe road connects Belfast and Derry.

result.eng: Shut your mounth!
result.ga: Dún do bhéal
result.orig: Dún do bhéal
result.html: Dún do bhéalShut your mounth!
result.ponchtml: Dún do ḃéalShut your mounth!

result.eng: It was revealed in Belfast in the morning and again in Dublin in the evening.
result.ga: Nochtadh i mBéal Feirste ar maidin é agus arís i mBaile Átha Cliath um thráthnóna
result.orig: Nochtadh i mBéal Feirste ar maidin é agus arís i mBaile Átha Cliath um thráthnóna
result.html: Nochtadh i mBéal Feirste ar maidin é agus arís i mBaile Átha Cliath um thráthnónaIt was revealed in Belfast in the morning and again in Dublin in the evening.
result.ponchtml: Noċtaḋ i mBéal Feirste ar maidin é agus arís i mBaile Áṫa Cliaṫ um ṫráṫnónaIt was revealed in Belfast in the morning and again in Dublin in the evening.

result.eng: Open your mouth.
result.ga: Oscail do bhéal
result.orig: Oscail do bhéal
result.html: Oscail do bhéalOpen your mouth.
result.ponchtml: Oscail do ḃéalOpen your mouth.

result.eng: We drove from Derry to Belfast.
result.ga: Thiomáin muid ó Dhoire go Béal Feirste
result.orig: Thiomáin muid ó Dhoire go Béal Feirste
result.html: Thiomáin muid ó Dhoire go Béal FeirsteWe drove from Derry to Belfast.
result.ponchtml: Ṫiomáin muid ó Ḋoire go Béal FeirsteWe drove from Derry to Belfast.

result.eng: I was raised in Belfast.
result.ga: Tógadh i mBéal Feirste mé
result.orig: Tógadh i mBéal Feirste mé
result.html: Tógadh i mBéal Feirste méI was raised in Belfast.
result.ponchtml: Tógaḋ i mBéal Feirste méI was raised in Belfast.

result.eng: They drove from Belfast to Donegal.
result.ga: Thiomáin siad ó Bhéal Feirste go Dún na nGall
result.orig: Thiomáin siad ó Bhéal Feirste go Dún na nGall
result.html: Thiomáin siad ó Bhéal Feirste go Dún na nGallThey drove from Belfast to Donegal.
result.ponchtml: Ṫiomáin siad ó Ḃéal Feirste go Dún na nGallThey drove from Belfast to Donegal.

result.eng: Does she spend much time in Belfast now?
result.ga: An mbíonn sé i mBéal Feirste mórán anois
result.orig: An mbíonn sé i mBéal Feirste mórán anois
result.html: An mbíonn sé i mBéal Feirste mórán anoisDoes she spend much time in Belfast now?
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn sé i mBéal Feirste mórán anoisDoes she spend much time in Belfast now?

result.eng: My mother and father are from Belfast.
result.ga: Is as Béal Feirste do mo mháthair agus m'athair
result.orig: Is as Béal Feirste do mo mháthair agus m'athair
result.html: Is as Béal Feirste do mo mháthair agus m'athairMy mother and father are from Belfast.
result.ponchtml: Is as Béal Feirste do mo ṁáṫair agus m'aṫairMy mother and father are from Belfast.

result.eng: The words came out of her mouth as small clouds of steam.
result.ga: Tháinig na focail amach as a béal ina néalta beaga gaile
result.orig: Tháinig na focail amach as a béal ina néalta beaga gaile
result.html: Tháinig na focail amach as a béal ina néalta beaga gaileThe words came out of her mouth as small clouds of steam.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig na focail amaċ as a béal ina néalta beaga gaileThe words came out of her mouth as small clouds of steam.

result.eng: She lifted her blouse to slip the nipple of her breast in her daughter's mouth.
result.ga: D'ardaigh sí a geansaí chun didín a cíche a shá isteach i mbéal a hiníne
result.orig: D'ardaigh sí a geansaí chun didín a cíche a shá isteach i mbéal a hiníne
result.html: D'ardaigh sí a geansaí chun didín a cíche a shá isteach i mbéal a hiníneShe lifted her blouse to slip the nipple of her breast in her daughter's mouth.
result.ponchtml: D'ardaiġ sí a geansaí ċun didín a cíċe a ẛá isteaċ i mbéal a hiníneShe lifted her blouse to slip the nipple of her breast in her daughter's mouth.

result.eng: The next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.
result.ga: D'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shin
result.orig: D'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shin
result.html: D'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shinThe next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág na coṁarsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó ẛinThe next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.

result.eng: Everybody in the house said in unison.
result.ga: Arsa bunadh an tí as béal a chéile
result.orig: Arsa bunadh an tí as béal a chéile
result.html: Arsa bunadh an tí as béal a chéileEverybody in the house said in unison.
result.ponchtml: Arsa bunaḋ an tí as béal a ċéileEverybody in the house said in unison.

result.eng: He put them upside down in the middle of the floor.
result.ga: Bhuail sé a mbéal fúthu i lár an urláir iad
result.orig: Bhuail sé a mbéal fúthu i lár an urláir iad
result.html: Bhuail sé a mbéal fúthu i lár an urláir iadHe put them upside down in the middle of the floor.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail sé a mbéal fúṫu i lár an urláir iadHe put them upside down in the middle of the floor.

result.eng: Our ears are deafened by his constant talk of nothing but Babaí.
result.ga: Tá ár gcluasa bodhraithe aige agus gan as a bhéal ach Babaí
result.orig: Tá ár gcluasa bodhraithe aige agus gan as a bhéal ach Babaí
result.html: Tá ár gcluasa bodhraithe aige agus gan as a bhéal ach BabaíOur ears are deafened by his constant talk of nothing but Babaí.
result.ponchtml: Tá ár gcluasa boḋraiṫe aige agus gan as a ḃéal aċ BabaíOur ears are deafened by his constant talk of nothing but Babaí.

result.eng: He got a lump in his throat.
result.ga: Chruinnigh cnap i mbéal a ghoile
result.orig: Chruinnigh cnap i mbéal a ghoile
result.html: Chruinnigh cnap i mbéal a ghoileHe got a lump in his throat.
result.ponchtml: Ċruinniġ cnap i mbéal a ġoileHe got a lump in his throat.

result.eng: Shut your mouth and stop talking nonsense.
result.ga: Druid do bhéal ó do chuid amaidí
result.orig: Druid do bhéal ó do chuid amaidí
result.html: Druid do bhéal ó do chuid amaidíShut your mouth and stop talking nonsense.
result.ponchtml: Druid do ḃéal ó do ċuid amaidíShut your mouth and stop talking nonsense.

result.eng: There is no describing the love I had for that girl.
result.ga: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaí
result.orig: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaí
result.html: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaíThere is no describing the love I had for that girl.
result.ponchtml: Níl léaṁ nó scríoḃ nó inse béil ar an ġrá a ṫug mise don ċailín udaíThere is no describing the love I had for that girl.

result.eng: First thing in the morning.
result.ga: Ar béal maidine
result.orig: Ar béal maidine
result.html: Ar béal maidineFirst thing in the morning.
result.ponchtml: Ar béal maidineFirst thing in the morning.

result.eng: All they talked about was the war.
result.ga: Ní raibh as a mbéal ach an cogadh
result.orig: Ní raibh as a mbéal ach an cogadh
result.html: Ní raibh as a mbéal ach an cogadhAll they talked about was the war.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ as a mbéal aċ an cogaḋAll they talked about was the war.
